name: javaPS 1.9.0
body:
javaPS enables the deployment of geo-processes on the web in a standardized way.
It features a pluggable architecture for processes and data encodings.
The implementation is based on the [OGC Web Processing Service standard version 2.0](http://docs.opengeospatial.org/is/14-065/14-065.html)
and the [OGC API - Processes - Part 1: Core version 1.0-draft.4](https://github.com/opengeospatial/ogcapi-processes/tree/1.0-draft.4)

Available in [Maven Central](https://search.maven.org/#search%7Cga%7C1%7Cg:org.n52.wps%20AND%20a:webapp%20AND%20v:1.9.0).

Documentation: https://52north.github.io/javaPS

## What's Changed
* Main by @bpross-52n in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/107
* Bump log4j-core from 2.15.0 to 2.16.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/106
* Bump log4j-api from 2.15.0 to 2.16.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/105
* Bump version.log4j from 2.16.0 to 2.17.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/112
* Bump version.spring from 5.3.13 to 5.3.15 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/115
* Bump version.jackson from 2.12.1 to 2.12.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/90
* Bump classloader-leak-prevention from 1.15.2 to 1.15.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/93
* Bump commons-io from 2.7 to 2.11.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/94
* Bump version.slf4j from 1.7.28 to 1.7.36 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/119
* Bump version.common.xml from 2.6.1 to 2.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/92
* Bump version.arctic.sea from 8.2.1 to 9.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/122
* Bump version.spring from 5.3.15 to 5.3.16 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/124
* Bump version.log4j from 2.17.1 to 2.17.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/125
* Bump maven-failsafe-plugin from 2.17 to 2.22.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/121
* Bump spring-boot-autoconfigure from 2.2.4.RELEASE to 2.6.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/126
* Bump commons-codec from 1.11 to 1.15 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/127
* Bump version.jackson from 2.12.4 to 2.13.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/128
* Bump jaxb-api from 2.2.12 to 2.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/129
* Merge develop branch by @bpross-52n in https://github.com/52North/javaPS/pull/130


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/52North/javaPS/compare/v1.8.1...v1.9.0
